name: Highlands (itch)
description:
Hello, I'm one-man team and this is my first Game.

Mostly used assets that are free or very cheap and edited them best I could.
And I'm proud to present you what has come out of a bit of hard work and time I invested in this project.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is Highlands:

Highland : Adventures -First Chapter- is classic 2D Platformer with cute art style but precise mechanics. In old style fashion there is no attacks, so you have to use your body and movement as one.
Collect pieces of map and help our Pilot find the way out of harsh environment of highlands , infested with slimes, frogs, wasps, plants with so many seeds that they shoot them around and other traps of highlands.
